thread.section_title: Goldline Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goldline | www.goldline.com | 3 of 183
thread.title: Michelle

author: Michelle
title: Michelle
text: The transaction was very smooth. All my questions were answered. Gerry McMillan was wonderful to work with. We played telephone tag for a week when I expressed interest in the company. He called but didn't hound me until I could return the call. I appreciated that. He always returned my calls almost immediately. I will definitely look at Goldline for my next precious metals purchase.
